pages.text: The Bamboo Spikes is a useful block that it will damage creatures that are standing and will deal more damage if it's pointing upwards and a creature it falling throught it.$(br2)Creatures will also be slowed by it. If the block is pointing upwards you can negate its damage by shifting.

You can combine it with any Lingering Potion either via Crafting or by right clicking with said item and it will convert into a tipped bamboo spikes.$(br2)Tipped bamboo spikes will always have 15 poison charges to begin which will get consumed once and entity walks on top of the block, receiving the poison status effect for 6 seconds. You can charge them back with dispensers and can be easily automated since they will only make observers pulse once they get fully depleted.
